lots of fun without friends but would be better with friends

I'll start off with saying this: the game can be fun, just one problem, the devs are lazy.
We get new chapters every 3 months and with it more bugs without fixing the old ones.
Today I got 4 error codes that made me disconnect from the game, making me lose my add-ons and offerings without earning anything.
If you do decide to get it, you won't regret the fun you'll have but expect at least 50% of the games you'll play to have a toxic player or to not fully play it cause of "lazy dev, no competition=no need for frequent AND good updates" Syndrome.

I'll finish this by saying that in the fog of this toxic waste, bug infested game you'll find wholesome people, like shining rays of hope, that have a big hearts and are helpful to new players.
